content.question: The graph of <math alttext="f prime" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>â€²</mo></mrow></msup></mrow></math>, the derivative of the function <math alttext="f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, is shown in the figure above. content.answer: <math alttext="a, is less than x, which is less than b" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>b</mi><mi></mi></mrow></math> and <math alttext="d is less than x, which is less than e" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>d</mi><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mi>e</mi><mi></mi></mrow></math>
